code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import CloudTags from'./CloudTags';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CollectionList=_ref=>{let{collections,toggleLike,handleComment,tags}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CloudTags,{tags:tags}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row g-1",children:collections.map(collection=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"collectionCard list-group-item p-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/collections/${collection.id}`,className:"linkToCollection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img_container mb-0",children:collection.image_url&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:collection.image_url,alt:collection.title,style:{width:'100%',height:'100%'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between ps-2 pt-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"cardHeader mt-0 mb-0 pb-0",style:{marginBottom:'0'},children:collection.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"itemsNum text-muted mt-1 mb-1",children:["items in collection: ",collection.itemCount]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex me-1 align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:handleComment,style:{border:'none'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-chat fs-2 text-dark"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn justify-content-center align-items-center",onClick:e=>toggleLike(e,collection.id),style:{border:'none'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:`bi ${collection.isLiked?'bi-heart-fill text-danger':'bi-heart text-dark'} fs-2`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"ms-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"likeCounter mb-0 me-2",children:collection.likesCount})})]})]})]})})},collection.id))})]});};export default CollectionList;
